name: Google Calendar Trigger
semantic_context: Starts the workflow when Google Calendar events occur
natural_language_description: 这是 Google Calendar Trigger 节点。主要用于: Starts the workflow when Google Calendar events occur

pollTimes.name: pollTimes
pollTimes.description: Time at which polling should occur
pollTimes.natural_language_description: 参数名: Poll Times | 作用: Time at which polling should occur | 默认值: {'item': [{'mode': 'everyMinute'}]}

calendarId.name: calendarId
calendarId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Calendar | 作用: Google Calendar to operate on | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

triggerOn.name: triggerOn
triggerOn.natural_language_description: 参数名: Trigger On | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: matchTerm (值: None) - Free text search terms to filter events that match these terms in any field, except for extended properties
